name: Voike
description: Voike enables digital media in emerging markets by simulating an online experience for prepaid cellphone users without unlimited data. This targets 80-90% of users who are mostly disconnected, starting with music, and benefits both users and advertisers.
one_liner: Voike enables digital media in emerging markets by simulating an online experience for prepaid cellphone users without unlimited data. This targets 80-90% of users who are mostly disconnected, starting with music, and benefits both users and advertisers.
